content: After resting at the Mahavira Hall Shrine at the top of the stairs, be sure to take assessment of your gear. Cultivate your best Spirits, make sure you have a lot of pills on hand an craft a bunch of extra Shock-Quelling Powder (you're going to need it).
promot:
This is an excerpt from the file 'Yellowbrow.md', within the main section titled 'Yellowbrow', specifically from the subsection 'Where to Find Yellowbrow'.
The content is as follows:
After resting at the Mahavira Hall Shrine at the top of the stairs, be sure to take assessment of your gear. Cultivate your best Spirits, make sure you have a lot of pills on hand an craft a bunch of extra Shock-Quelling Powder (you're going to need it).
